Doctor Evidence's Data HUB Management System
The challenges associated with managing medical literature often result in lost or incomplete knowledge and misspent resources. Doctor Evidence has developed a library and data hub management system in its DOC—Digital Outcome Conversion—suite of products. DOC Library and DOC Data create a Center Of Excellence and deliver clinical knowledge to multiple functional areas in a fraction of the time with increased accuracy.
Cardiology Oncology Immunology Vascular Diseases
Endocrinology Metabolic Inflammation Ophthalmology
Pulmonary Respiratory Diseases Neurology CNS
DOC Data is a powerful environment for structuring data and generating analysis from full-text clinical studies and other epidemiology sources. DOC Data enables finger-tip ready review and analysis of data for direct and indirect analysis. The methodologies incorporated into the DOC Data platform meet the highest global evidence-based medicine standards and practices. Data analytics are directly integrated into the R Project for Statistical Computing modules so there is no denigration tied to data portability issues. The centralization and structuring of clinical data into a single, quality-controlled data hub and networked repository streamlines access and integration into an organization’s best-practices workflows.
DOC Library has over 250,000 screened citations in it for the above topics and DOC Data has over 20 million highly curated data points.
